plugins.name: 핸드오프러브
plugins.description: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.나만의 발자님을 위한 사랑스러운 디자이너가 되어보세요OVERVIEW디자인 수정을 요청할 때, 핸드오프 문서를 전달할 때, QA를 진행할 때...디자이너와 발자님과의 관계는 항상 위태롭습니다.서로의 언어가 달라서 오해가 생길 때,‘핸드오프러브’로 사랑이 담긴 핸드오프 러브레터를 보내보세요!HOW IT WORKS발자님께 전할 내용을 입력하고 발자님의 언어를 선택하기만 하면,사랑스러운 핸드오프 내용으로 변환되어 내 피그마에 러브레터가 첨부됩니다.FEATURES1. 8개 이상의 개발 언어를 연인 스타일로 지원Python부터 Java, JS, SQL, Go, TypeScript, C++, 그리고 Android 개발자를 위한 Kotlin 언어를 지원하며 각 언어에 특화된 말투와 이미지가 지원됩니다.2. 사랑이 담긴 고급 프롬프트 패턴 엔진수개월 간 직접 설계한 각 언어 별 프롬프트 패턴이 적용되어 있으며, 수많은 연애 경험을 살려 고안한 실전 문장으로 변환됩니다.3. 디자이너 취향저격 러브레터 디자인문장 입력만으로 사랑가득한 러브레터 카드가 자동 생성되며 텍스트 수정도 가능합니다.4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.문의할 내용이 있다면,doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>
plugins.tagline: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

133082.name: 핸드오프러브
133082.description: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.나만의 발자님을 위한 사랑스러운 디자이너가 되어보세요OVERVIEW디자인 수정을 요청할 때, 핸드오프 문서를 전달할 때, QA를 진행할 때...디자이너와 발자님과의 관계는 항상 위태롭습니다.서로의 언어가 달라서 오해가 생길 때,‘핸드오프러브’로 사랑이 담긴 핸드오프 러브레터를 보내보세요!HOW IT WORKS발자님께 전할 내용을 입력하고 발자님의 언어를 선택하기만 하면,사랑스러운 핸드오프 내용으로 변환되어 내 피그마에 러브레터가 첨부됩니다.FEATURES1. 8개 이상의 개발 언어를 연인 스타일로 지원Python부터 Java, JS, SQL, Go, TypeScript, C++, 그리고 Android 개발자를 위한 Kotlin 언어를 지원하며 각 언어에 특화된 말투와 이미지가 지원됩니다.2. 사랑이 담긴 고급 프롬프트 패턴 엔진수개월 간 직접 설계한 각 언어 별 프롬프트 패턴이 적용되어 있으며, 수많은 연애 경험을 살려 고안한 실전 문장으로 변환됩니다.3. 디자이너 취향저격 러브레터 디자인문장 입력만으로 사랑가득한 러브레터 카드가 자동 생성되며 텍스트 수정도 가능합니다.4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.문의할 내용이 있다면,doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>
133082.tagline: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

plugins.name: Variant Randomizer
plugins.description: Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.How it Works:Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.Why use Variant Randomizer?Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
plugins.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

132240.name: Variant Randomizer
132240.description: Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.How it Works:Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.Why use Variant Randomizer?Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
132240.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

plugins.name: selection-text-styles
plugins.description: 選択済みのNODEに含まれるTEXTを text-style ごとにまとめて選択することができます。選択した TEXT は figma の機能で style をまとめて変更することができます。mixedになっているものはまとめてmixed扱いになるので複数のtext-styleを一つのTEXTに設定している場合にはまとめて変更は行いにくいです。
plugins.tagline: 選択済みのNODEに含まれるTEXTを text-style ごとにまとめて選択することができます

plugins.name: Blueprint
plugins.description: Blueprint is a UX documentation tool that helps create UX flows & development instructions lightning fast. Just import your Figma designs to Blueprint and create UX flows on its grid-based canvas.Visit blueprintapp.design to learn more about Blueprint!Key features:Import Figma design: Import selected frames or the entire page.Grid canvas: Arrange and organize Figma frames super fast.UX flowchart: Draw UX flows with arrows and diagrams using Figma designs, making it easier to communicate with your teammates.Add annotations: Write down instructions or detailed guidance about a selected scene for clearer communications.To get started:Install the Plugin from the Figma CommunityEnter your Figma File URLChoose specific Frames or import all Frames to BlueprintClick the "Open on Blueprint" button to begin designing your UX flows
plugins.tagline: High-fidelity UX Flows Made Effortless

132111.name: Blueprint
132111.description: Blueprint is a UX documentation tool that helps create UX flows & development instructions lightning fast. plugins.name: 今日の日付
plugins.description: 今日の日付をテキストプロパティに入力するだけのプラグインです。インスタンスを選択してください。プラグインを立ち上げてください。プロパティを選択します。「今日の日付を入力」押下。インスタンスを選び直した時は、更新ボタンを押してください。This plugin just inserts today's date into a text property.

plugins.name: Refine Selection
plugins.description: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for FigmaTransform your selection workflow with this powerful tool that helps you select and deselect layers with precision. Perfect for designers who work with complex designs and need quick access to specific layer types.Key Features:• One-Click Selection: Instantly select all layers of a specific type within your current selection• Alt+Click to Deselect: Hold Alt (or Option) to deselect layers instead of selecting them• Smart Layer Detection: Automatically identifies and filters:- Text layers- All shapes- Primitives (stars, polygons, lines, rectangles, ellipses)- Paths- Lines- Image layers- Frame layers- Components- InstancesWorkflow Benefits:• Save Time: No more manual selection of multiple layers• Reduce Errors: Precise selection of specific layer types• Smart UI: Buttons automatically disable when no matching layers are found• Intuitive Design: Clean interface with visual feedbackPerfect For:Designers working with complex layoutsTeams managing large design systemsAnyone who needs to quickly select specific layer typesDesigners who frequently work with nested components💡 Pro Tip: Hold Alt (or Option) while clicking to deselect layers instead of selecting them!Note: Free version includes rate limiting of 50 selection per minute. Subscribe to remove limitations and support future development.
plugins.tagline: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma

136478.name: Refine Selection
136478.description: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for FigmaTransform your selection workflow with this powerful tool that helps you select and deselect layers with precision. Perfect for designers who work with complex designs and need quick access to specific layer types.Key Features:• One-Click Selection: Instantly select all layers of a specific type within your current selection• Alt+Click to Deselect: Hold Alt (or Option) to deselect layers instead of selecting them• Smart Layer Detection: Automatically identifies and filters:- Text layers- All shapes- Primitives (stars, polygons, lines, rectangles, ellipses)- Paths- Lines- Image layers- Frame layers- Components- InstancesWorkflow Benefits:• Save Time: No more manual selection of multiple layers• Reduce Errors: Precise selection of specific layer types• Smart UI: Buttons automatically disable when no matching layers are found• Intuitive Design: Clean interface with visual feedbackPerfect For:Designers working with complex layoutsTeams managing large design systemsAnyone who needs to quickly select specific layer typesDesigners who frequently work with nested components💡 Pro Tip: Hold Alt (or Option) while clicking to deselect layers instead of selecting them!Note: Free version includes rate limiting of 50 selection per minute. Subscribe to remove limitations and support future development.

plugins.name: Gename Thai
plugins.description: Generate Random Thai Names PluginQuickly generate random Thai names for your designs! This plugin allows you to select one or multiple text fields and generate random names for males or females, with the option to include or exclude surnames.❖ Generate Unique Names: Ensure each selected text field gets a distinct, random name.❖ Customizable Gender Selection: Choose from male or female names based on your project needs.❖ Surname Option: Add Thai surnames for a complete name experience.❖ Easy Integration: Select your text fields, click "Generate", and watch your text change instantly!---สร้างชื่อไทยแบบสุ่มได้อย่างรวดเร็วสำหรับการออกแบบของคุณ! ปลั๊กอินนี้ช่วยให้คุณเลือกข้อความหนึ่งหรือหลายช่อง เพื่อสร้างชื่อสุ่มสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิง โดยเลือกได้ว่าจะมีนามสกุลหรือไม่มี❖ สร้างชื่อที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน: ให้ชื่อที่สุ่มออกมาไม่ซ้ำกันในแต่ละช่องข้อความที่เลือก❖ เลือกเพศได้ตามต้องการ: สามารถเลือกชื่อสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิงได้ตามความต้องการ❖ ตัวเลือกนามสกุล: สามารถเพิ่มนามสกุลไทยให้กับชื่อได้❖ การใช้งานง่าย: เลือกช่องข้อความ กด "Generate" แล้วชื่อจะถูกเปลี่ยนทันที
plugins.tagline: Generate Thai name

123503.description: Generate Random Thai Names PluginQuickly generate random Thai names for your designs! This plugin allows you to select one or multiple text fields and generate random names for males or females, with the option to include or exclude surnames.❖ Generate Unique Names: Ensure each selected text field gets a distinct, random name.❖ Customizable Gender Selection: Choose from male or female names based on your project needs.❖ Surname Option: Add Thai surnames for a complete name experience.❖ Easy Integration: Select your text fields, click "Generate", and watch your text change instantly!---สร้างชื่อไทยแบบสุ่มได้อย่างรวดเร็วสำหรับการออกแบบของคุณ! ปลั๊กอินนี้ช่วยให้คุณเลือกข้อความหนึ่งหรือหลายช่อง เพื่อสร้างชื่อสุ่มสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิง โดยเลือกได้ว่าจะมีนามสกุลหรือไม่มี❖ สร้างชื่อที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน: ให้ชื่อที่สุ่มออกมาไม่ซ้ำกันในแต่ละช่องข้อความที่เลือก❖ เลือกเพศได้ตามต้องการ: สามารถเลือกชื่อสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิงได้ตามความต้องการ❖ ตัวเลือกนามสกุล: สามารถเพิ่มนามสกุลไทยให้กับชื่อได้❖ การใช้งานง่าย: เลือกช่องข้อความ กด "Generate" แล้วชื่อจะถูกเปลี่ยนทันที

plugins.name: Recount
plugins.description: Recount replaces text layers with a counter, starting from any number, based on the XY position of each selected layer.How to use:select the layers to be countedrun Recountenter a number to start from (or hit ENTER to choose 1)choose a direction to count along (or hit ENTER to use LTR)Left-to-right and right-to-left directions are available.
plugins.tagline: Easily count layers by their position

plugins.name: Remove and select next
plugins.description: 😟 FIGMA NATIVE BEHAVIOR-> Removing a layer triggers a global deselect.Consequently, you need to take your mouse to select the next layer you want to work on.🥳 PLUGIN BEHAVIOR-> Removing a layer select the next layer.Meaning you don't need to take your mouse back and you can continue to design at the speed of light on your keyboard!⌨️ KEYBOARD SHORTCUTPlugins can't have keyboard shortcuts so you'll have to set it on your own.See this page for a tutorial on macOS native keyboard shortcuts and BetterTouchTools
plugins.tagline: Remove layers without leaving your keyboard

113969.name: Remove and select next
113969.description: 😟 FIGMA NATIVE BEHAVIOR-> Removing a layer triggers a global deselect.Consequently, you need to take your mouse to select the next layer you want to work on.🥳 PLUGIN BEHAVIOR-> Removing a layer select the next layer.Meaning you don't need to take your mouse back and you can continue to design at the speed of light on your keyboard!⌨️ KEYBOARD SHORTCUTPlugins can't have keyboard shortcuts so you'll have to set it on your own.See this page for a tutorial on macOS native keyboard shortcuts and BetterTouchTools

plugins.name: BrandLife
plugins.description: Seamlessly integrate your design workflow with BrandLife using the BrandLife Figma Plugin. Effortlessly import files from your BrandLife library directly into Figma and use them in your creative projects. Once your designs are ready, export assets back into BrandLife, ensuring they are correctly organized within the right assets and collections. Simplify collaboration, maintain brand consistency, and keep your assets organized—all from within Figma.

plugins.name: comodo exporter
plugins.description: This plugin helps you rename and export layers named $IMG in your Figma project based on special tags. You can choose between two workflows:Destructive export: Layers are renamed and export settings applied (JPG, PNG, SVG, @1x, @2x, @3x). Once renamed, the original $IMG layers are lost, and the plugin cannot be rerun unless you revert to an earlier version.Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.
plugins.tagline: Rename & export $IMG layers via tags. Template & docs coming soon for easy setup.

134292.name: comodo exporter
134292.description: This plugin helps you rename and export layers named $IMG in your Figma project based on special tags. You can choose between two workflows:Destructive export: Layers are renamed and export settings applied (JPG, PNG, SVG, @1x, @2x, @3x). Once renamed, the original $IMG layers are lost, and the plugin cannot be rerun unless you revert to an earlier version.Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.
134292.tagline: Rename & export $IMG layers via tags. Template & docs coming soon for easy setup.

plugins.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
plugins.description: VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflowsVariable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.Features : - Swap variables between local and published libraries- Switch collections between local variables- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily- Work with current selection, page, or entire file- See what will change before you apply it- Handle thousands of variables at once- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variablesHow to use : 1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.RoadMap :- Find all variables used in your designs- Export and import variable collections- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.
plugins.tagline: Master all your variable workflows

138841.name: VariableMaster - Swap Variables
138841.description: VariableMaster - Master all your variable workflowsVariable Master is your complete variable workflow solution for Figma. Switch variables between any libraries - local to published, published to local, or between different files. Whether you're swapping collections within the same file or moving components from one library to another, Variable Master makes it simple and fast.Features : - Swap variables between local and published libraries- Switch collections between local variables- Switch component variables from library A to library B easily- Work with current selection, page, or entire file- See what will change before you apply it- Handle thousands of variables at once- Pick which collections to swap or exclude specific variablesHow to use : 1. Choose what to update (selection, page, or file) and pick your libraries from the drop down.2. Select which collections to swap and see the preview.3. Uncheck variables you don't want to change, then click on swap variables.Ps : plugin picks libraries only if they are added in the File. You can add them to you file via Asset panel.RoadMap :- Find all variables used in your designs- Export and import variable collections- Check for design elements that need variables​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This Plugin is completely free to use, No charges for swapping variables.

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description: CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.✨ Easily write new content from scratch.🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!How to UseChoose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.Enter your API key for the selected model.Select a text layer in your Figma file.Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.Get Gemini API KeyGet ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

136517.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
136517.description: CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.✨ Easily write new content from scratch.🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!How to UseChoose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.Enter your API key for the selected model.Select a text layer in your Figma file.Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.Get Gemini API KeyGet ChatGPT API Key
136517.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: Brand compliance check
plugins.description: Branding compliance check Figma PluginPurposeThe Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.FeaturesDesign Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.Usage guidelinesSelect Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
plugins.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned

135406.name: Brand compliance check
135406.description: Branding compliance check Figma PluginPurposeThe Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.FeaturesDesign Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.Usage guidelinesSelect Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description: # Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin## OverviewThis Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once---## Main Features- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).- **Background Blur Effect**The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.- **Batch Processing**Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.- **Japanese UI**Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.---## How to Use1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**Multiple selection is supported.2. **Launch the plugin**Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.3. **Click the "Create" button**A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).4. **Notification**Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.---## Notes- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.- Settings are saved per Figma file.---## Data Security- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.- No external API or server communication is performed.---# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン## 概要この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です- 複数画像を一括で処理できます---## 主な機能- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。- **背景ブラー効果**元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。- **複数画像の一括処理**複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。- **日本語 UI**直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。---## 使い方1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**複数選択も可能です。2. **プラグインを起動**UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。4. **通知**成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。---## 注意点- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。---## データセキュリティ- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

133688.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
133688.description: # Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin## OverviewThis Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once---## Main Features- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).- **Background Blur Effect**The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.- **Batch Processing**Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.- **Japanese UI**Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.---## How to Use1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**Multiple selection is supported.2. **Launch the plugin**Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.3. **Click the "Create" button**A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).4. **Notification**Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.---## Notes- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.- Settings are saved per Figma file.---## Data Security- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.- No external API or server communication is performed.---# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン## 概要この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です- 複数画像を一括で処理できます---## 主な機能- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。- **背景ブラー効果**元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。- **複数画像の一括処理**複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。- **日本語 UI**直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。---## 使い方1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**複数選択も可能です。2. **プラグインを起動**UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。4. **通知**成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。---## 注意点- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。---## データセキュリティ- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。

plugins.name: Motionmill
plugins.description: Prepare Your Figma File for Development with This PluginThis Figma plugin helps you set up a well-organized and developer-friendly design file from the start. It allows you to quickly define and document your color palette and typography styles—both as Figma styles and directly within the design file.By standardizing colors and text styles early in the process, you create a solid foundation for a consistent visual identity and a smoother handoff to development. Developers can easily reference the documented styles and convert them into design tokens or variables in code (e.g., CSS variables or a design system setup). This includes font families, sizes, line heights, and color codes—all clearly named and structured.This plugin is perfect for teams looking to streamline collaboration between design and development. It saves time, reduces confusion, and ensures consistency throughout the project.
plugins.tagline: Colors and Typography for Motionmill
